[ Identifiers | To Do | Deprecations ]

To Do List


To Do in pyxb.binding.basis.complexTypeDefinition.wildcardAttributeMap
  • The map keys should be namespace extended names rather than QNames, as the in-scope namespace may not be readily available to the user.
To Do in pyxb.binding.basis.element._real_substitutesFor
  • Do something about blocking constraints. This ignores them, as does everything leading to this point.
To Do in pyxb.binding.content.ElementDeclaration.defaultValue
  • This should recursively support filling in default content, as when the plural list requires a non-zero minimum number of entries.
To Do in pyxb.binding.facets.CF_pattern
  • On creating new instances of non-string simple types from string representations, we could apply pattern constraints. That would mean checking them prior to invoking the Factory method.
To Do in pyxb.namespace.resolution.NamespaceContext.declareNamespace
  • ensure multiple namespaces do not share the same prefix
  • provide default prefix in pyxb.namespace.Namespace
To Do in pyxb.xmlschema.structures._ScopedDeclaration_mixin.scope
  • For declarations in named model groups (viz., local elements that aren't references), the scope needs to be set by the owning complex type.
